name: Blooming Nightshade
description:
After hearing about a number of student couples forming at her school, Himeka Uchida decides to look for a girlfriend of her own. As she gets wrapped up in the daily lives of her friends and classmates at Solana Academy, will she find the romance she seeks?

Originally created for the Yuri Game Jam, Blooming Nightshade is a light-hearted romance story where Himeka gets to know her friends better, potentially finding love in the process.

This game is developed with Android phones in mind, but can also be played on PC.

Features:
Free (with optional donation)
6 love interests
Friendship and romance paths for each girl
Randomized weekly events each play-through
After-stories for each romantic ending
